title: Is It Time to Buy Stocks Again? One Indicator Says So.
text:
Investors might have oversold stocks, and it’s time to consider entering the game again, according to Bank of America Merrill Lynch.

The back story. August has seen many macro headwinds including the latest rounds of tariffs between the U.S. and China, the yuan devaluation, an inverted yield curve, recession in global corporate earnings and PMIs, as well as geopolitical tension between Hong Kong and Beijing, Japan and Korea, and India and Pakistan.
